page.title: 20Community Council: FINTRY
page.content: It is we who have attempted this coverage for the Domesday Project. We have tried to span for you, the age groups, opinions and activities of the people who live in this shoe box of a valley, with its two high sides and two low sides.{But remember, while you {delve into our four squares, that what {is described in one, can occur in {others too. Remember that we are people of the post industrial age and transition to an information age is barely possible to grasp. We ask you to bear with us, therefore, to forgive us leaving out that which you would dearly have wished to see. We've learnt a lot about ourselves and our surroundings and{we thank the BBC {for the invitation to take part, and {also William the Conqueror for giving {them the idea.
